Merge Domain data with subject-level data

Source: R/util-MergeSubjects.R
MergeSubjects.Rd

Merge Domain data with subject-level data

MergeSubjects(
  dfDomain,
  dfSubjects,
  strIDCol = "SubjectID",
  vFillZero = NULL,
  bQuiet = TRUE
)

Arguments

dfDomain

Subject-level domain data containing one record per participant.

dfSubjects

Subject level data often using ADSL-like data. Should include one record per participant for each participant included in the analysis population (all other participants should be dropped before calling mergeSubjects)

strIDCol

name of ID Column - default='SubjectID'

vFillZero

Columns from dfDomain to fill with zeros when no matching row is found in for an ID in dfSubject

bQuiet

logical Suppress warning messages? Default: TRUE

Value

data.frame with one record per strIDCol.

Examples

MergeSubjects(
  dfDomain = clindata::rawplus_consent,
  dfSubjects = clindata::rawplus_subj,
  strIDCol = "SubjectID"
)
